channel.title: Project-OS - Stable Economy - OSRS Content - Great Community
channel.description:
[CENTER][b]Project-OS[/b]
[b]WEBSITE:[/b] [url=http://pr-forum.net/]http://pr-forum.net/[/url]
[b]DOWNLOAD NOW:[/b] [url=https://www.dropbox.com/s/x1icrz61655srkd/Project-OS.jar?dl=0]https://www.dropbox.com/s/x1icrz61655srkd/Project-OS.jar?dl=0[/url]
Project-OS is a 317/474 old school and economy based server with great features and osrs content. At Project-OS we have an great community, active players and active staff members. We listen everyone's suggestions and ideas in the server, cause that's what we need!
Project-OS offers you a lot of great features. OSRS Content, Stable economy, great combat, awesome community, 24/7 uptime, achievements to complete and a lot of stuff! We got an very helpful staff team, doesn't matter what time is, you will always get help in server! We care about the community. Server is currently rapidly growning. We're currently looking for some experienced staff members that are mature and capable for the spot! (no staffhunters). Project-OS staff team are working a lot everyday, fixing everything that is needed, adding everything what is possible to us!
Our server is not the best one, but it's something what players can enjoy and have fun in general! You are more than welcome to join us. Come and even try it!
[b]Project-OS Features[/b]
-Highscores -vBulletin Forums -OSRS Items -OSRS Bosses -Stable economy -100% Clan Chat -24/7 Online -Minigames -Achievements -Godwars -FunPK -Lottery -Prestige System (3 Levels) -Double EXP every weekend -Bonus drop rate system -All working skills -Custom titles -Wilderness bosses and their custom made drops -OSRS Gameframe + orbs -Killstreaks -Great combat -Completionist Cape -Armour & Weapon chests -Active Server and forums -Mature and experienced staff team
And a lot of more! Come and see!
[b]Project-OS Staff Team[/b]
Eazy - Project-OS Founder & Owner Dark Bow - Project-OS Website Developer & Server Lad - Server Moderator
